title: Rawtastic
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Fusion
description: Raw vegan restaurant with smoothie & juice bar, opened Sept 2015. Features creative live food cuisine with dishes like kelp bolognese, beetroot falafel, shroom burger, power rolls, and vegan cheese platter. For dessert a colorful array of raw cakes and treats. Beverage list includes house-made kombucha, cold pressed juices, and cold brew coffee. Offers weekend brunch.
